p: In the Disctrict Court for the Third Judicial District of Washington Territory holding Terms at Port Townsend in and for the Counties of King, Jefferson, Island, Clallam, Whatcom and San Juan September Term A.D. 1875.
John Kaefe John Lewis Thomas Wright and John Mathews

The of the Territory of Washington in and for the Third Judicial Disctrict of the Territory aforesaid good and lawful men of the counties of Jefferson Island Clalam Whatcom and San Juan duly empanelled charged and sworn to require of and concerning offenses
committed against the laws of the Territory of Washington aforesaid. On their oath do prercul that the said defendants on 2d day of May AD 1875 did kill and murder an Indian Contrary to the statute in such care made and provided and against the peace and dignity of the Territory of Washington aforesaid
Dated at at Port Townsend in thie District aforesaid on the 16th day of Sept. A.D. 1875
